items.sentence: Tom grudgingly accepted the money Mary offered him.
Tom is afraid to walk through the woods by himself.
When was the last time you were invited to a party?
I'd give my right arm for a house as nice as Tom's.
I wonder how many people commit suicide every year.
What else do you want to do while you're in Boston?
Is there any way to keep this from happening again?
It's not necessary for you to stay here any longer.
It isn't necessary for you to stay here any longer.
I'm pretty sure Tom is doing that just to spite us.
